titles.title: A resolution designating the week of August 1 through August 7, 2011, as "National Convenient Care Clinic Week", and supporting the goals and ideals of raising awareness of the need for accessible and cost-effective health care options to complement the traditional health care model.

A resolution designating the week of August 1 through August 7, 2011, as "National Convenient Care Clinic Week", and supporting the goals and ideals of raising awareness of the need for accessible and cost-effective health care options to complement the traditional health care model.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Designates the week of August 1-August 7, 2011, as National Convenient Care Clinic Week.
Expresses support for such Week's goal of raising awareness of the need for accessible and cost-effective health care options to complement the traditional health care model.
Encourages use of, and calls on the states to support the establishment of, convenient care clinics.
